EmailTemplate.name: Thank you 7-18-17
EmailTemplate.subject: El Barrio es Nuestro Community Meeting 7/18/17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for joining us on July 18, 2017, for “El Barrio es Nuestro” community meeting. We appreciate everyone's active participation and enthusiasm in working together to eradicate the blight, vandalism, and social ills affecting the quality of life in our community. There was great energy and we look forward to continuing to work with you.
Save the Date
El Barrio es Nuestro Meeting
Date: August 22, 2017
Time: 5:30 -7:30pm
Location: HACE
Somerset Villas 200 E. Somerset Street. Philadelphia, PA. 19134
We look forward to your participation in our the next meeting
